DOC.brief_title: Prophylactic Photodynamic Therapy Organ Transplant Patients
DOC.criteria: Organ transplant recipient . Age 40 year old . Patients young 40 year old 70 year . Clinical sign skin cancer , actinic keratoses wart time inclusion . Previous photodynamic therapy skin area investigate . Pregnancy breast feeding patient . Patients porphyria . Patients tendency produce hypertrophic scar keloid . Patients know allergy Metvix . Patients consider able follow treatment protocol ( e.g . severely alcoholic patient , dementia patient , mentally ill patient etc . ) .
